lead_paragraph: A new restaurant from the Charlie Bird team dabbles in pizzas and pastas, and specializes in wine.

headline.print_headline: Coloring Outside the Lines in Little Italy
headline.main: Pasquale Jones Brings a Little Novelty to Little Italy

snippet: A new restaurant from the Charlie Bird team dabbles in pizzas and pastas, and specializes in wine....
abstract: Pete Wells reviews restaurant Pasquale Jones in Little Italy neighborhood of Manhattan.
